item.title: Recon on myself
item.description:
Welcome fighters!

Hello, as you have already come here that means you are interested in red teaming and blogging staff. A very good welcome to you guys and for your time.

What You’ll Find Here

Red Teaming Notes

I share real-world notes and tactics I’ve picked up through learning, labs, and exercises. Think of it as my personal “Field Manual” — from privilege escalation to lateral movement and beyond.

My own stuff that i will be learning constantly
